narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Changing Turns With Team Llc is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Cincinnati, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $1.7M in Medicaid payments across 16K claims serving 3K beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $1.7M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
